title: An American Werewolf in London   (BBC Drama 1997)
description:
An American Werewolf in London



Updating and expanding the story told in the 1981 film of the same name, this drama features the stars of the film in their original roles. Two American backpackers suffer a frenzied attack on the Yorkshire moors. One survives, and he soon discovers that the assailant was more animal than human.

Cast:
Alex Price - Jenny Agutter
George Hacket - Brian Glover
The Kid - Mark Lowin
Seageant McManus - Mervyn Stutter
Inspector Villiers - David Bannerman
Larry Talbot - Michael Roberts
Nurse Gallagher - Eve Karpf
Jack Goodman - William Dufris
David Kessler - Eric Meyers
Doctor Hirsch - John Woodvine

Based on original screenplay by John Landis
Produced and adapted by Dirk Maggs
Music - Wilfred Acosta
Produced by Audio Movies Ltd for BBC Radio 1

First broadcast: BBC R1 1997
